lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (roaring, crunch) After being killed in battle, Pike felt angry. She wanted to be stronger so that it would never happen again. She spent four months at sea, training with the men and women aboard a ship called the Broken Howl. Gripping her holy symbol in one hand, and her morningstar in the other, this time, Pike is ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A creature of impulse, Grog felt only pity for this terrified little thing. His disobedience cost him dearly. Beaten bloody and banished by the herd leader, his uncle Kevdak, Grog was abandoned and left to die. Exiled from his herd, it was then that the relative of the very gnome he fought to save, saved him. It was the kindness of a gnome cleric named Pike that healed Grog, bringing him back from death's edge. And they have remained close friends ever since. Most nights, Grog can be found challenging entire taverns to wrestling matches! Or accompanying Scanlan to the nearest house where you pay for lady favors. Also ale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Part of the Aramente is proving yourself a strong warrior, a valiant protector, and a wise and compassionate leader. With this knowledge, one thought plays in repeat in her mind: is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When he awoke, Percy began to design his first gun. (gunshot)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dranzel's Spectacular Traveling Troupe where he learned the ways of the world, and honed his skills as a bard extraordinaire. A loner much of his life, Scanlan has never quite come to terms with the violent death of his mother at the hands of a goblin invasion. While his years on the road provided many, shall we say, educational experiences with the opposite sex, deep down Scanlan yearns for the one thing he's never known: the true love of a fellow gnome. Still, Scanlan considers himself a lover first, performer second, and fighter distant third. On the battlefield, he'll support his allies, but rarely draws blood unless it's to protect fellow gnome, Pike. Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Greetings and salutations. I am Tiberius Stormwind. I hail from a town called Ty'rex, located in the heart of Draconia, born from a politically respected family. At the age of 15, I succeeded in passing the Sorcerer's Rite, showing prodigy-like control of my magic. The judges and the Draconian High Council were amazed at how powerful my spells were for how long I had been training. At 20 years old, I was the youngest appointed member of the Magic Guild in Draconian history. For the next few years, I almost went mad from the malaise of being a guild member, as it's rather boring. However, one day I happened upon a chamber, unused for quite some time. In the room were stacks of books and maps of the surrounding cities and areas around the known world. For months I would frequent the chamber, and learned of artifacts from legend. After a long period of research, I made a list of artifacts that caught my eye. I brought these findings to the high council and was told that all of the information in the chamber I had stumbled upon was either believed to be fiction, or unsolvable mysteries, and hence were lost forever. I found those answers to be unacceptable. A year later I devised a ruse and managed to convince the city council to lend support in me leaving Draconia on a mission of peace and diplomacy for the surrounding kingdoms, going from town to town and making friends and allies, in and for the name of Draconia. Being a red dragonborn, I had quite the task on my hands in that respect, but it was exactly what I needed, so I could explore the world and find these artifacts, as I felt the truth was out there. Some may describe me as buffoonish, but I say poppycock to all that. I am much sharper than most give me credit for. I just don't pay attention to things sometimes. I've also been known to be rather cunning, loyal, happy-go-lucky, and well, dangerous. I can't help but show my true scales every now and then. But overall, I think I'm quite friendly for a dragonborn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never entirely welcome in the company of elves or men, Vax'ildan learned at a young age to skip past formality, preferring instead to invite himself in your door. Along with twin sister Vex'ahlia, Vax was born by a chance encounter between elven royalty and human peasantry. Raised by their mother in their early years, the twins were eventually sent off to their father in the elven capital of Syngorn, but their cool reception among the elves there never warmed, and their time in the capital didn't last. The siblings stole away one autumn night and set out on the open road. After a few years of wandering, they eventually decided to return to their mother, and journeyed back to the lands of their youth. But instead of finding their childhood home, they returned to a pile of rubble. Their mother was gone, their home burned to ash. Pressing the townspeople for answers, they learned of the day the dragon came. With their ties all severed, Vax'ildan and his sister set out to find their fortune together in Tal'Dorei. An outsider since birth, Vax quickly learned to solve life's challenges in his own particular way, often by sidestepping them entirely. And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn't enough, the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome back to the next episode of Critical Role. We unfortunately are down one Grog this evening, as I mentioned before.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (distressed noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our charity, 826LA, which we're putting up links in the chat room for you guys if you're able to donate. It's a fantastic program that tutors children, helps with creative writing and general literacy skills. It's a wonderful program, you can look it up at 826LA, you should Google it, find the website, it has all the information you need. It's a really great charity and we're still pushing that through our show every week, so thank you for all who have donated, and if you have the opportunity to, I highly recommend it. Also! I wanted to let you guys know we have-- Marisha wants to mention a cool sponsor tonight or at least a promotional push we're pushing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Their tabletop bath bombs, which are awesome d20s--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d10s, technically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, d10s-- No, there's a d20! There's a d10 and there's a percentile die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're right! I saw the wrong side of it, my apologies. Forget I said anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So yes, and we'll probably also go ahead and throw in a Critical Role signed picture as well with this. What you have to do is tweet @EspionageMakeup, is their twitter, @EspionageMakeup and #CriticalRole, and tell them what your favorite character is from Critical Role and who your favorite nail wraps are today and then we'll pick at half-time a winner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Long day. Long day. So upon traveling deep into the recesses--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry Matt, you just have to talk for three straight hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your day is just getting started.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. But yes, so they have now, after a series of battles, found their way into the magma-covered, kind of obsidian jagged caverns where the Emberhold, the duergar fortress currently resides, where they believe Lady Kima was. Upon finding a way in, unfortunately announcing their presence to the fortress itself, they managed to find Lady Kima in a torture chamber beneath Emberhold, save her, slay her oppressor, and now they have, after a tenuous alliance was made-- as Lady Kima and their mind-flayer friend Clarota are very much at odds-- a very tenuous alliance was forged. And they now journey back up to the main basement floor, or main base floor of the Emberhold proper. And that's where we left off last time. So, hope you can absorb all that, guys. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are inside this fortress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are moving towards the armory. We're trying to find the armory or something, is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're trying to find, essentially-- Lady Kima has mentioned she wants to find the rest of her equipment that she says is either in an armory, or she mentioned a vault. And also she knows-- she mentioned something about vengeance to those who run the keep. So she stormed up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're following her, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've followed her back into the base floor of the Emberhold itself. You all currently are now back kinda where you started after you snuck into the side passage of the Emberhold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she said she would lead the way to the vault?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we be quiet for a second and see if there's any footsteps around us or guards marching around? Are we in immediate peril or do we have a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly. Everyone go ahead and make an immediate perception roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So fast!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Website went live, if you want to announce that now or later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Later. Two?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, 22! (laughs)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Fail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a fail! All right, so-- You've got to be ready!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure he'll give you half of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nearly at the ready. All right, so as you all take a moment and kind of steel yourselves, your ears perk up and you can hear what sounds like echoes of distant footsteps down hallways, far out of sight. You hear some movement across the stone ceiling above you that eventually comes to a stop. And you wait for about a minute, and the entire place is now in a very eerie silence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They know we're here, still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they don't know where we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Maybe they went to sleep?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lady Kima, do you remember where the vault is? Do you remember how we can get back there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima turns to you, her eyes still peering back, and she's creeping towards the edge of the hallway. She looks back at you, briefly, and says, "I've only seen half of this stronghold before "they captured me. As far as I know, probably somewhere on the second floor."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What floor are we on now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The ground floor."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The ground floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So it's just one up? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were there stairs-- When we went down that set of stairs there, was there also stairs going up right there, or stairs going up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were stairs-- Right there? No. There were stairs going up in the first room you entered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right! So we could go back in the little storage room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And go up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should just spend the next three hours in the storage room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go in the storage room and go up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm gonna go stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll stealth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And inch past her. That's good. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there's that eagerness to get in some sort of a fray or to feel somebody else bash along the side of this greatsword that she borrowed from you guys. She lets you pass. You creep up along the edge. As you do, you see-- back here there is, in the middle of this hallway, a series of doorways, and what looks to be a large room in the center of the chamber where two duergar currently stand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I turn back to the group.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispers) How about the other way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we just kill them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Isn't that a corner-- a dead-on corner right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is another hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go kill the duergar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How dark is it in here? Is it like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's pretty dark in here. Like, with low light vision, you're able to see maybe a good 30 to 40 feet ahead of you. There are a few of those red crystal clusters that give off a little bit of light, incrementally, but duergar themselves, you've gotten to the point where you see they like it very, very dark. They actually aren't needing light. This is more of a courtesy to guests they may have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So potentially, brother, we could take them both out if you throw your knife and I do an arrow.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait, didn't we see further past that, 'cause that's where Grog did the-- (crushing noise)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, this is the area that we haven't been in yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just put up a hand, and then slip around this direction and slip down this second hallway that you revealed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you step past, you do see, this room here is a little ajar; the inside looks to be a storage room. There's just a series of boxes, barrels, and various--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Maybe you can put yourself in a box and walk around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) Yes! Metal Gear Solid it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I continue to creep away from my sister, specifically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you glare down the side of this hallway. It leads to two other smaller rooms down the way, with a split towards the back end. There does not appear to be anybody visible in that hall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I got this, I'm going to keep going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what about us!?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are you doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you go past this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. Two duergar, we can take them out in a second!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now this hallway, there appears to be an opening to this room, no doorway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody wait while my brother goes on a field trip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this additional room, you do not currently see an entrance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An opening that's not a doorway? Or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there isn't a door in the way, it's just an opening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The door is open. All right, so I'm going to press against the wall, up to the edge, wait for five seconds, see if I can hear anything, and then if not, curve around and peek in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. You take a moment and listen. You hear what sounds like a light crackling of some sort of a fire? And the occasional dull ring of metal being hit against metal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was it? Metal against metal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to get low to the ground, and peek in the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Peeking through, you do see, indeed, it is some sort of a smithy, with two kilns, or two anvils, set up, a work table in the center, and there is one lone duergar that, apparently, in the middle of his work, has not been paying attention to any of the ruckus going on around, and is just in the middle of hitting some sort of long, thick piece of black iron, and it's just, (ting ting), sweat dripping down the front of his brow, the room itself is-- even against the corner of the doorway, you can tell the temperature is a lot warmer on the inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And his back is to me, currently?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's kinda to the side to you. He's currently looking-- working out the anvil, banging down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, but I see the door on the other side, so I take the earring--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, why don't you just keep going forever?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- take the earring and I whisper to my sister, (whispers) follow along.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I've been invited on the field trip, guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who else can stealth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a stealthy panther right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you wanna be something and pop in my pocket? (laughs) That sounded wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't had a short rest yet, and you do--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (clears throat) I was gonna say, I'm still a cat form. But I can accompany you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Send Scanlan up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My brother's calling for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel the oppressive force of Clarota's voice in your heads simultaneously say, "I can also accompany."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good plan. Good plan, Clarota.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll step ahead and go invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so mark off your next Invisibility spell. As you vanish, Clarota also kind of waves his hand for a moment, and his image disappears the same way Scanlan's did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! He does that too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did he do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're humming to yourself--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way down and eventually towards the back of where Vax is pressed against the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can feel Scanlan's flute pressing into my buttocks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not my flute! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I turn to them, and then I start-- I pass the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna go around the corner to that other door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And now I'm going to stab the duergar in the neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! Go ahead and roll for an attack!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20, natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how you start the game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a good day! I feel like it's gonna be a good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a sneak attack, as he didn't-- it was not aware you were there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where-- how do you make it work? 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight, 13--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get him in the neck so he can't yell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh. 66.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't multiply the modifier. The modifier goes on at the end. So it's the dice roll plus your sneak attack, multiplied by two, and then the dex modifier at the end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus seven, I think, right at the end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's the damage plus the sneak attack, double that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then add the plus seven at the end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 28 times two plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Splitting hairs here! That's enough. So.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One plus two plus two plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him just (grunts) and slump down to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I catch the hammer and I start going 'Tink! Tink! Tink!' And wave the two invisible beings into the room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey! What happened in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're here! We're ready to fight. What do you need us to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima at this point-- You can see her hand kind of tensing around the sword as she looks back at Grog, whose hands are also wringing his greataxe. "I want to kill something!" She kind of backs off to the side and sees the other duergar that are there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (Grog voice) I want to rage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she's going to go ahead and run around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't waste my natural 20, Kima. Come on!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, you can't control Kima!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is why we don't have AI in the party, guys. You can't control the AI.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know you guys are telling a very, very angry woman right now to be patient. Doesn't seem to make a ruckus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I sneak up to the corner at least, so I can be ready to attack those two bastards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over to here? All righty. Trinket, who hasn't seen you in a while, is sticking to your back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit there and I kind of pet him as I look around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket is enjoying the petting. All right, so that duergar's down, the current armory section appears to be completely open and at your disposal. There are a series of partially made weapons kind of scattered in a pile. There are some ingots, and even some raw iron material in the far corner. Other than that, it just looks like your general smithing workshop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Kima with us now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima is currently looking around this section with you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kima, do you see any of your equipment here that you wanted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances around, goes and move some of the piles by, turning over the room as quietly as she can-- not as quietly as you'd like-- but quiet enough. "No. Nothing's here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't you just take one of these things and call it a day? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glares in the direction of your voice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm invisible, I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This will do me just fine for now!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. Let's keep looking." She leaves the room. She starts heading down this way--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm following after her, tiptoeing after her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go after her. 'Cause we're all gonna split up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I speak into my earring and say zubba zubba zubba zubba.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's all go in that back way and see if we can stealth around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. For everyone else, stealth check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Here we go!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes! Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage on you, Pike, because of your heavy armor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So that means I roll twice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll twice, take the lower.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take the lower one.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Now as that happens, I want to cast Mage Hand and I want to cast Light on it, and I want to slowly have it drift down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both concentration spells. You can have one or the other.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Dagnabbit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mage Hand isn't an actual object, unfortunately.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Dagnabbit. Okay, fine. Instead I cast Prestidigitation and I make a little glowy orb, and it's a little flickery, and I cast-- I think I can maybe try, what, 15 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And where are you casting it? Just in the middle of this hallway here?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No. To my left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He wants to see in the dark place.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I wanna see in the dark place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a door on the opposite side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now it's a well-lit wall.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what was your stealth roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it was 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Roll for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh gosh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (bear noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he just got what I got. Crap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I add to it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add his dex modifier. Trinket's dex modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, hold on. Hold on. Oh, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys are making your way down the hallway, slowly--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kinda clamp my hand over his mouth and tell him to shush.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way down here. One of the duergar glances over--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- utters something to the friend at his side and he goes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I heard the bear and I start sliding my back down along the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh crap. I turn around and notch my arrow for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Trinket moves past

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk up to the very, very edge of the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you watch them both walk past you, one of them continues past with his hammer out, rushing towards whatever he sees moving at the end of the hallway, probably Tiberius after Trinket. The next one that comes past you, you reach around and just take your dagger and swing it across the back of his neck area. You manage to sever the base of the spine and he just crumples into a pile in front of you. The other one-- Damage?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 11 points of damage.

lines.text: You open the door. It appears to be some sort of a guest bedroom. It's a singular bed that's in much better condition than the barracks, it's empty, it's well-made. It's more lit than the other rooms. It seems to be a room that's designed for either non-duergar riff-raff or general soldiers or guests or people that would come to the fortress to stay, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: All right.

There are large wooden tables, there is a fire pit in the center that has a number of mostly burned wood that is mainly just small darkened embers with a little bit of glowing yellow and red to it. There are stools scattered about the room, you can see there are remnants of some of a meal that hasn't been fully cleaned up yet on some of the tables. But the room appears to be empty. You do see a slight glimmer across the way on one of the tables.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Snoop in the barracks.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to make my way around all this riff-raff, uh, no, uh, yes.

lines.name: ORION

lines.name: ORION

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: Oh, inside the door there?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move around--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With Trinket!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like walk by the door and see that happening (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But also just covering it up with a blanket afterwards.

lines.text: Okay, well, you're in mid-process, this is all happening very quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. (grunts)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go around back behind where Trinket and Vex just went.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Because of your little legs you get about that far. Your little legs carry you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) (grunting and laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm staying in the hallway,

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: Okay, so. Tiberius, as you're backing up, both the duergar turn around immediately, seeing you, and rear back with javelins, throwing them directly at you.

lines.text: Oh! I'll cast Blur instead.

lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll initiative real fast to see who gets off first what.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because it flew out of my hand, I didn't roll it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's on camera, tell them to play back.

His visible image begins to actually blur; the outline looks almost like there's two mirror images of Tiberius in the same place that are both shimmering and preventing them from actually telling where he's actually standing. The first javelin comes in at a 14.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 17. Yes.

lines.text: Ha-ha.

lines.text: It's kinda dark, and you can see movement in the distance.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: You can try. All right. So you hop on the back of Trinket, (laughs) looking over the top, and you know Grog is kinda blocking part of your view, but you can see, with your low-light vision, what looks to be Tiberius' form shimmering and two duergar-height individuals that are partially blocked by him. So they do have partial cover, or three-quarters cover. Do you have the feat that ignores that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Because you don't know I'm going to say no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be called Sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah it would be called Sharpshooter, is the feat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't have that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. So go ahead and roll for attack on one or both duergar, up to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The 21 misses, the 23 hits. Because they have cover and because it's so dark it's difficult to make out their form, but you do manage to hit one with the arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I Hunter's Mark him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Next time, make sure you do that before you attack. Otherwise it won't count for the attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Okay. 13, uh, 12! (laughs) Math! Stay in school.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right. There you go. 12, then add your Hunter's Mark bonus to that as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good, one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, gotcha. So one arrow sinks in the shoulder, but doesn't appear to be stopping his angry advance towards Tiberius. Let's see. You're staying where you are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Waiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys are actually kind of like pinched off in the hallway right here, so as you guys are all kind of--

lines.name: SAM
