lines.text: What's going on in here? Are there any enemies I can see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see over here, barely. It's very dark in the far corner, you can see just the shape of some humanoid there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. Okay, is he-- (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughs) How tall is the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see, it's maybe roughly six, seven feet. Grog's blocking most of it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, like, we're in a bunker, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, you're in this giant great hall with giant tables and stools everywhere.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And the ceiling is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't see the ceiling right now, there's no light.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room is near pitch-black, like there's just very little light in there currently.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I will waltz in behind Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The room all of a sudden bursts into view, you can now see the walls, the ceiling-- it's a smooth stone room. There is a large chandelier currently hanging from the top of the ceiling. It's about 25 feet up to the ceiling in this current room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) There's a big chandelier. That's fun.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And now do I see that guy better?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes. You see now there is a mind flayer currently ducking behind one of the tables right now. You can see a number of your friends in the party are currently clutching their heads, silently screaming to themselves, unmoving.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ah, right. There's another one of those guys over there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, there's another one?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I spend three sorcerer points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many sorcerer points do you have left? You spent a lot over the past couple games.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I have not, because I didn't do anything last game, because I was all recharged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, actually. Okay. Just keep track of that. So how many do you have left?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have eight right now. Now I'll spend it to go down to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Five. 'Cause math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got you. Cool, good on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fantasy math. Once again, 826LA, after-school tutoring. Good charity.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I could have used it. I cast my pillars, or Grand Columns, as I like to call it, and (piston sound) all the way up and smash that little bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Smashy smashy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the save you get past that for the spell?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He does a dex save, and he takes 6d6 damage, and the dex save is to see if he's pinned or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. It does make its save, I believe, it's 21?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, my, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled a 21 versus your DC of your spell, which I believe is not higher than 21.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, so he still takes the damage, but is not pinned.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Which is 15, 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 18 points of damage, and manages to pull out of the way just in time as it slams into him, he darts off and catches himself on the ground, kind of slowly levitating above the ground as he comes to a stop. The pillar then slams into the roof, this section here. Actually splinters part of the table, which is now kind of lifted off-kilter at an angle. Yup. It--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's how-- so he has to travel that distance, so does he cast Levitate as he's coming down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How I'm playing it is, the impact of the pillar suddenly slamming in from underneath is what does the initial damage, and he manages to roll off before it slams into the ceiling. He kinda-- So. However, that ends your turn. The mind flayer, now looking around and seeing the room lit up, seeing the entire group now in this room, looks around at everyone, puts its hands together and concentrates-- and as it does you see its form (sucking noise) vanish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few seconds pass, you guys manage to shrug your stun, and Clarota as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa, what happened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They really know we're here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get out of this room, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just search the rest of this floor as quickly as possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As quickly as possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, can you always put down the dust of tracelessness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I will." He's doing his flower-girl moment. Passes behind you guys. All right, so, what is the current mode of action for you guys?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and dart down this hall that we know is for sure empty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Exit the other side of the great hall that we're in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I think we should all go back-- we should go to the second floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Walking in that door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look through here and see what appears to be some sort of a kitchen. You can see shelf units, you can see what looks like a few tables, you can see some kitchen elements.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna walk all the way in, all the way in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you walk all the way in. There's a door towards the back--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The right, what do I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The right, you see what looks to be a doorway that's partially open that leads to a staircase.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Up or down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like it's going up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what's in this room? I'm looking over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you look over here. It's a double door that is currently closed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will head in your direction as well.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Eight, two of my d6s to heal up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't taken a short rest yet. You have to-- you guys have to stop and take ten minutes, 15 minutes to rest to do that, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm gonna look all over the great hall and see if there's any cool stuff in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think what we should do-- Everyone, I think what we should do is make our way back to the initial storage room we were in and go up that stairway, because that one's hidden. It's by a hidden entrance, people aren't gonna think about that one as much as main stairways.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I agree, I think we should-- I agree with that, I just think we should check the rest of the floor as well. Just double-check everything, make sure we didn't miss the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is heading back to the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy and I are checking this room with the double doors. Do you have any trap checks to see if it's locked?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Percy and both you guys open this doorway. It opens up into what looks to be another smaller eating hall. This one's nicer, this one has one long table. This is probably where the more socially risen--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a quick look around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, anything in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like it hasn't been used for a day or two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No cool goodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No current goodies in this area, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we'll go-- just keep going down and check the rest of that hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a lot more, you guys. I think we should go find the vault on the second floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys press down here. There apparently are now-- you can see there's another set of double doors--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is following.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I should gather the group and try to make it back to the other storage room. Just to get us out of this area specifically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are all moving back with--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that cool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- Vex to return to the previous storage room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can do that. Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you'll hear us if anything goes wrong. Yeah, we'll power through it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Use your earring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go ahead and very-- I'm just gonna kinda use my keen sense-- or sorry, my keen smell again to see if I can smell any duergar in the area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a perception check with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty good. Oh yeah, I'll take that first roll, which was seven-- 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. You smell that on this floor, there doesn't appear to be any duergar in your immediate vicinity. There is a strong, lingering scent of them coming from the doorway that you're currently at.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A strong, lingering scent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, like it-- you can kind of tell there was a recent moving of a large number of duergar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But probably not present.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever. I guess we'll see what's in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Peeky, peeky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I kind of parkour past Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Parkour past Percy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Parkour, parkour!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open the doors into what appears to be a large temple chamber, a place of worship. What you see are a series of long, wooden benches that are arranged to look towards the center. There is an altar to the right that is a risen kind of stone dais, and in the center there is a stone table, an altar which has a piece of black cloth wrapped over it and something on top of it you can't see from this distance. In the center of the room there is a 12-foot-tall statue of what looks like an extremely strong armored duergar clutching a giant warhammer and a shield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hm. I'm gonna-- oh wait, I'm a tiger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna perception check the room. Which is high. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? There does not appear to be anybody inside this room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Screw this room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, do you have a religion--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to do a religion roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll religion, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could I do a religion roll from where I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are not over there, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was gonna do, is tell somebody to get Pike over here real quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys have earrings?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can put on my sprinter's boots.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Pike, Pike? There's some sort of religious artifacts over here. Could use your expertise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you make your way through, eventually coming down this hallway-- (clanking)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's coming! I can hear her coming.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey guys, I'm here! Did you know I was coming? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a religion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't stab anything.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm gonna follow suit, but slowly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the god that basically freed them from their original enslavement from the illithids, and they worship as a pinnacle of power, strength, and conquest.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I make it up to where those guys are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's keep searching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, what's the darkness right next to me? Is there a door there? What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a door right over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I'm gonna open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. So you go ahead and open the door. It opens up into what you can immediately see is a chamber that is some kind of magical laboratory. You see in the far corner, hunched, a robed duergar, and as you open the door, there's a slight sound, a click sound, and a jet of greenish fume begins to spray up into your face. Make a constitution save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, god. I don't even know what that is! (laughs) 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you can feel the poison forcing its way into your lungs. You manage to back out of the cloud in time and cough it up and your general physical well-being-- you resist most of the effects of the poison. However, this poison fume trap did appear to go off and as the smoke slowly dissipates, you hear a chuckle across the other side.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I hear the noise, I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't hear the noise, you're too far away.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys do hear it, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I come over there and see what the-- what just happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you rush over, Scanlan's backed up away and you can see there's this chamber here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the poison still in the air, or is it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dissipated at this point. It's thin enough. You still can smell it, and it smells awful, like a very, very heavy, electrical fire-type smell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I can see that guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So should I notch an arrow and try to hit him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you. What're you going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I attack him, then!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it then.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Attack him! Get him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shabang! Oh, dang it, I didn't do it. I meant to Hunter's Mark him and transfer it over, but that's okay, I didn't say it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't say it this time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 30. For the first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did say shabang.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did say shabang, and 16 for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both hit. Go ahead and roll damage on each.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (music flares up)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, sort of. 15 and eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 and eight. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The music is on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So both arrows you've been firing over the top. He's kind of hard to see with the table and from being crouched in the corner, but both arrows still manage to barely make their mark. One kind of pins him against the wall, and he looks at his shoulder briefly, looks back at you, raises his hand, as he begins muttering something under his breath. As he does, your arrow (shnk) through his hand and he tries to shake it, and now he's pinned to the wall with an arrow in the middle of his hand.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket! Oh no, I used two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dang it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still tell Trinket to move. What are you gonna do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no no, I'm gonna hold him there, 'cause he's already in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got you. All right, so what are you guys doing over in the temple?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Exiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Look and see if there's anything cool, first. What was that thing that's covered up by the blanket on the altar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You keep walking towards it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. What's up with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way, you look at the top of the dais where the altar is, and on top you can see the black cloth that is wrapped over it. The scent gets to you before the actual visual. It's freshly rotting flesh of some kind, and as you glance over, you can see there is a heart that has been cut from a body and it's at the point where the blood has coagulated and begin to become thick. It's roughly dwarven size.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get up and I grab it in my mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It tastes disgusting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I walk over to Vax and I lay it at his feet. I kind of nudge it with my nose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She got you a heart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scritch Keyleth behind the ear, but nudge it aside with my toe and exit the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did scritch her ears, but I'm going to continue down to the end of the hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you make your way into what looks like a giant foyer, into a secondary entrance in the side of the fortress.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just walk all the way over to the corner, stealthing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's high, it's 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28, got it, okay. So, as you make your way through, you eventually careen to this corner. You can see another hallway, what appears to be another room of some kind. You also glance back and see there are two sets of stairways that go up and down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's behind me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a giant foyer that leads outside of the fortress.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the edge of the map this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way here? This way? This comes to an abrupt end at that point, a rocky wall into the mountain itself that it's buttressed up against.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm gonna keep coming this way, stealthing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you move through--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's happening with that dude I-- are you doing all this while I just pin down--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know what's going on back there. I'm just walking around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you glance in this room. There's an open walkway and what appears to be another barrack section, also completely empty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Screw that. Do I see a door for this room that's still darkened out? Then I'm gonna keep sliding along the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you slide along here, to make your way around to a door there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Pressing my hand, just to see if I can check any for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, all right. The door does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna be heading in that direction anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Agreed. Same here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to stealth through the door.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Before I leave, I carefully examine that statue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what are you examining?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The facial features of the god, the deity, right? Is that what he is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It almost glistens with a perfection that is out of place in an area that is so covered in soot and various other volcanic activity-based mineral deposits.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm gonna do a quick arcana check, just to see if there's any kind of mystical thing around it or anything like that. And it's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There is some sort of a hum to the air that has an arcane element to it, but you are unable to pinpoint what it necessarily means or what the source is.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Interesting. Knowing that, I kind of gather my thoughts and I head towards where the rest of the group is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, while you're opening the door, the mage in the far corner kind of looks about sporadically and looks down at the arrow in its hand and its shoulder and just kind of fearfully, "Wait wait wait! Wait. Stop. Don't attack. Let's have a conversation."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Speak fast. Before I kill you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans forward, kind of pulling the arrow out of the doorway. (groans in pain) Starts hobbling towards you a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we all-- we go in the room and Trinket goes up next to him and, like, gets all up in his face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you both enter, both of you make constitution saving throws. As two more plumes of poison (pff) out of the ground as both you and Trinket walk in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, okay. And for Trinket as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 for Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take seven points of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket, however, takes 14 points of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man. What did I get, seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. And Trinket is currently considered poisoned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It means disadvantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on ability checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now there's a bear coughing and kind of thrashing about the room. The table it bumps into and it kind of topples over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this like a turn thing or can I do something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this is just a reactionary moment of you guys coughing and trying to get out of this poisonous fume.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, can I quickly cast Protection from Poison on Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that cures it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That completely removes the poison?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done. So that's your action. You now, as you are checking the door and you open it up, you hear all this commotion going off to the side now. Scanlan, you're over there as well, watching as more plumes of these poisonous smoke bits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I get close to the door without going through it, can I see the guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move over and look, you can just barely make out his form. It is a dark room that is currently filled with a slowly dissipating green cloud so it's hard to make him out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if I can't see him then I will just yell at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll yell with Vicious Mockery. I don't like you very much for poisoning me and my friends, you're a poopy head! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So vicious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is threatening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. That does seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know how that works.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Vicious Mockery. It's an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's crazy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's, like, 80 points of damage!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And who said that words couldn't hurt people?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And bonus damage to his mother, wherever she may be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sticks and stones can break my bones, but words can hurt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hands drop and it looks like for a minute his intent to begin muttering some sort of incantation is momentarily distracted.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, awesome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I start moving back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can start moving back this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hear that, but I'm still going to poke my head stealthily through the door and see what I see. Do I need a new stealth check or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, great. So that is a 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you glance inside at what looks to be some sort of a training room. There are-- most of the floor itself is stone, and in the far corner there is a large section that is mainly just sand and dirt and there are a number of wooden training structures. You know, various shields and wooden bars that are used as a means of training for weaponry. There's what looks like a giant rack of weapons, full of arms and stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anything good-looking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of the materials in this room look like the basic duergar fare.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These don't look very good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to run in and take a look around anyway so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay. As you run in, go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Traps, traps, traps-traps-traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, you manage to dive out of the way and touch the ground to ground the energy, minimizing the damage. But yeah, you triggered (laughs) triggered a trap plate. You're beginning to get the sense that a lot of this tactic of this fortress now has been to lead you guys through a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maze?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A maze of traps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A labyrinth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before we hurt ourselves any longer, we should--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to kill this guy. Or talk to him at least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to get to the main event here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see Kima coming into the room behind you guys. Steps over the broken table, down in front of the circle, and grabs the mage by the front of his robe, pulling him into her face. The mage at this point is still kind of reeling from the fact that you managed to strike him so deeply in the heart of his hearts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's just not a nice man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, Kima, with a look of absolute death in her face, grabs him and pulls him forward and says, "Listen, where is the rest of your fucking army?" She's going to make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does not succeed in resisting that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The duergar is pressed against the wall now, and she's slamming him against the back of a bookshelf. "Look, all right, they're waiting for you up there, all right? You're not "going to survive this. At this point, the entire city's probably waiting for you in the outside of "the fortress and those that are upstairs are well-prepared. Okay? Your best chance of survival "is laying down your arms and surrendering. I'm looking out for your best interests here."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kill this asshole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see her just slowly pushing the blade through his body into the bookcase behind. As she does, she goes, "You're gonna tell me, right now, "who they have waiting for us upstairs." As she begins to push all the way to the hilt now, he's pinned up against the bookcase and probably a portion of the stonework behind him. He's now got blood pouring out the sides of his face and outside the front of his nose. The duergar being held up against the wall says, "Whatever you haven't killed. The army's probably up with the king "himself. They're all waiting for you and I hope they piss on your body when they're done!" At which point she takes the blade and twists it. As she does, he gives this guttural yelp and his eyes just go blank. Blanker than the duergar eyes normally are.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I make it to the doorway and go, what is going on in here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any-- taking that in-- any healing potions or anything in here that we could use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I look at the door and see if the trap will go off again if we step through it again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like, from glancing about the room and getting a feel for it, there were three traps that were all placed directly at the front of the door, basically to give him a point of defense, they've all been triggered, so you don't have to worry about any more in this room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this still considered the Underdark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, cool!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go in and look around some more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking around as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look around for potions and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's considered the-- aw, I could have been rolling twice for all these damn things!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sings) Remember your abilities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's the singer here, people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, Scanlan. So, as Kima pulls the blade from its body, kicking it off the greatsword and wiping it across the leather on the side-- the leather that you gave to her! And a little part of you is like, (sadly) hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all right. Worth it. This halfling's hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys made your way back, Clarota's there, against the corner, and Grog rushes over, just feeling like he was ready for action. "What's going on?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're too late.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This might be a good time to stop for a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you guys, as I say, do you guys want to take a short rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I find any potions? Did I find anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Glancing around the room, you manage to find two potions of healing, one potion of superior healing.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that? That's major.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also find one vial of some sort of weird, viscous yellow liquid that you cannot identify.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, don't open that. Who knows how long those guards had to be staked out here? Don't open that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do a-- can I investigate it or arcana it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you can give it a go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. That's a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, no, that's a seven. These dice are horrible. Anyway, it doesn't matter. It's bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks delicious. No, actually, you can't make out, it has some changing color as you kind of swirl the bottle and watch the texture inside shift and change with the centrifugal force. You can't make out anything about its intent, but it does feel like it's a potion created with some effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tiberius, do you want to drink this?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No! What is it? I check it for 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: For whatever you're trying to hand to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 arcana? Okay. You take a look at it. It definitely is magical, you don't have a lot of experience with alchemy but you gather that the effect that it would have upon imbibement would be to alter your physical form in some way, you just don't know the specific effects.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Absolutely, Scanlan, I'll take that for now. And I put it in my pouch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you guys all kind of enter this room, this brief safe zone to take a short rest, if you feel you want to heal yourself up and regain any short rest-based abilities, do so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we talk about what this duergar just told us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we go to the bathroom before we do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I was going to say. We can return-- So we're going to take a quick bathroom break, we're going to play the videos again, we'll return here in just a second, as the next element of the attack on Emberhold continues.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and this is your last chance because after the break we'll pick a winner for the Espionage giveaway. So, last chance if you want to tweet @EspionageMakeup and #CriticalRole and look at our sweet nails! They're awesome. They're cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispers) Galaxies! All right, see you guys in a second.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, guys! All right, so we've had ourselves sufficiently rested.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Indeed we have. We have a Tabletop Promo Day kit to give away, because you guys got the 50 subs since we started today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is awesome.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That's the group that Critical Role is supporting, and these guys are here out of the graces of their heart, and it would be very helpful for you guys to donate to them and show your love for Critical Role by donating to the charity. We'll post the link in the chat. Get those donations rolling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Zac out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, thank you, Zac! Couple of quick things. You wanted to announce the Espionage--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! Our winner for the Espionage Bath Bombs Tabletop from @espionagemakeup goes to (drumroll) Danny Carr. Who is @Eleine35. So, Danny, I'm pretty sure you follow me on Twitter, just PM me your address and I'll get these out to you. And thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, did you follow him? Because you have to follow him--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I have to follow-- Oh, well then I'll follow Danny right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome! Also, as a heads-up, guys, we've had some people perpetually asking us about the shirts that we made.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You mean these shirts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That shirt right there. So, we have a-- it's a temporary-- it's very basic, but we have up, if you guys ever want to go to critrole.com, we have a limited run of those shirts currently available for purchase.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very limited, like once they're gone, they're gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's less than-- probably less than 15 of each size, less than that, probably. It was a small amount.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was wearing mine earlier today and I only rolled 20s. Only.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true. So, it's www.critrole.com, and, yeah, and the site is still under construction, so. But we managed to rush it out, and I wanna give a huge shout-out to Michael Whitesman, who's a big friend of ours, for helping us make the website

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thanks, Whitey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: @whitesly, if you want to bug him, and, yeah, so, if you buy--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's his nickname! It's not like a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whitesly! His last name is Whitesly.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is actually his nickname.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just sad that you don't call me Whitey.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I mean, I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Let's start. After this game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyways. Anyways, you can go buy t-shirts now, which was the whole point of that. At critrole.com. And there's a limited run. Once they're gone, they're gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cost includes shipping. We'll get-- we're packaging them ourselves. We'll have, hopefully, more in the future, but this is the first attempt at trying to do something like this for you guys, so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We're doing this all ourselves just to, just 'cause-- See how this works. You guys--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that includes the shipping, that's why the price is--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So future t-shirts-- Were you guys saying something, like it would be artwork from--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, this was, we got this from @rusegafdi. He wore this at Tabletop Day, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A very similar design, so yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so we're-- we decided we're going to do, like, fan-designed t-shirts. So, once every so often, we'll do a fan-designed t-shirt, and yes. And then-- but they'll all be limited, so yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Shipping, shipping is included with the price, guys, don't worry. But yeah. So, anyway, check that out! Thank you guys so much, and let's go ahead and get back to the game proper.

lines.name: CREW
lines.text: They're now sold out. They bought all of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: T-shirts are sold out!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We didn't even finish telling you people!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No they're not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let us finish our sentence first!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, so, so the limited run was very limited--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I guess we'll have to order some more, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh, mental note: make more t-shirts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't know! We didn't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We were gauging interest. I guess there's interest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Congratulations to the 100 people who got 'em.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on. Tiberius is gonna work some magic, and then try to conjure up a few more. He was unaware there was a shortage of, of those-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, guys, all right, well, we'll-- thank you guys very much, we'll get more to you very soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what to say! Oh god, I'm like, going to cry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Second run, yeah! Just hashtag them critical role and we'll-- oh, but if you're selling them already, there's somebody that's making really cool t-shirts on Redbubble, but if you're making them there, like, we can't print them too, so, like, just submit them to us, and then we can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we'll figure it out! Anyway, guys, thank you so much! Let's get to the game!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you! Cool!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, guys, the chatroom just solved the Israeli-Palestinian conflict! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, chat! Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got a box of stuff coming right for you right now. Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, I'm like, shaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. For all who didn't get 'em, we'll have more soon, I promise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you guys like &? What is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) We didn't know if people liked our show or not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. So. So, you've housed yourselves into this enchanting room, this magical laboratory, and taken about a 15-minute rest. You're able to use any of your unused hit dice to heal yourself up if need be. Any--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, well, where's everybody at? 'Cause maybe I can just do a-- some healing up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just spent a healing surge, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's, well, as far as health goes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm low, yeah, I'm pretty low.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, what are you at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many hit dice do you have left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm at, like-- I accidentally erased it, but I believe I'm at 30?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh, yeah, you-- I need to, I'll get on that. Anybody else? What's everybody at?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can sing to you and give you an extra little roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like you to sing to me, either in the game or on another day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you Vex or Vax? (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm Vix.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll sing to you and-- are you gonna use a dice?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. Ah, let me see how beautiful your song is

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Heal the Vax, make him a better elf.

lines.name: SAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: (sings) For you and for me and the entire adventuring band.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) There are duergar dying, if you cared enough for the adventurers, you'd bring Vax back to help us with the stabby-stab. Thank you, thank you, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, don't Vax-inate them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's the difference. All right, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get a 1d6 for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, an extra 1d6 healing to anyone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who needs more than one? Three, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's my--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a blister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you guys manage to pull yourself out of your rest mode, you now glance out, and the hallway's still quiet, you can hear the movement of footsteps up above you. What is your intent?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To win!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Wait, what are we gonna do, 'cause here's-- there's an army waiting upstairs for us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They know we're up there, but Kima needs her stuff, and we need to kind of put an end to this problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna hop out of tiger form, by the way, since we rested and stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, they're above us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they're all upstairs, including the mind flayer who vanished from the room we're in, so I'm sure he told everyone what's going on. But they don't know we've found the secret entrance, so I think we should go-- Vex'ahlia's correct, we should use the stairwell near the secret entrance.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are we sure there's no other way out of here, through this particular floor? Is that the only exit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's-- I mean, there's the front entrance, there's that door over there, there's like two other stairways, but we should use this back one, by the back entrance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, Lady Kima, our purpose here was to find you, but your purpose is somewhat greater than our own. What do you suggest we do in this moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she stands up, and she holds the greatsword and swings it a bit. "What I'm seeking "lies deeper into this cavern. Whatever is at the heart of this illithid scourge." And she glances over at Clarota-- who's in the back corner, hands folded-- and there's a slight mental hiss sound in her direction. "There's something far darker at the heart of this temple. I've seen it. But I have "my thoughts and my ideas, but I need confirmation before I speak of any doom-saying. However, the "link between those foul creatures and the assault that's currently mounting against Kraghammer lie "upstairs at the center of this duergar people."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, here? Here at-- where we are now? Yes, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The link between this K'varn character--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And let me ask you this. We can be on the same page, we can go up and fuck shit up. However, your weapons and armor-- would they be a great help? Should they be our short-term purpose, or should we just go up and try to end this problem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be honest, we've entirely lost the element of surprise. I would not wish to sacrifice "as foolishly for a few additional trinkets of my own when I feel that this should do well enough, "as long as we manage to work together and be smart about this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we should potentially just leave this castle for now and go find K'varn, rest up--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, Kima is saying this is the main event.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She just said there's a link upstairs. The link from-- to K'varn that we need to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get it! Okay. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How do you think K'varn is able to send these armies up again and again towards the back "door of Kraghammer?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Besides, if we go on and leave them as they are, who's to say they wouldn't come up behind us, "and then we're fighting a two-sided front once we get there?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then let's-- We gotta go upstairs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vox Machina, our years are short. Let's make good use of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's leave this decision up to Grog.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Absolutely not! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog's standing there clutching his greataxe. "I say, I haven't been able to kill much "since we got here. Let's kill something!"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's a terrible idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have some ale before we go out, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yeah, of course." And he goes into his bag of holding, and pulls out his now half-empty cask, and you see him frown as he hears it clink around. He pours everyone a small drink, to what is now an empty cask.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This could potentially kill us all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vox Machina.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Vox Machina!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan had a great idea, though. Should we talk about what Scanlan wants to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, yes, I have an idea. But also, are there two stairs up to the top floor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's multiple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perhaps we should use more than one. One, half of our band go up, create a diversion. The other half sneak up and kill, kill, kill. That's one option. The other option--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike leads the diversion group.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, I do have an idea about gaining the upper hand on our first meeting with this army that's upstairs. An intimidation technique of some sort.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're not going to kill another pony, are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Much as I would love to. No, but we've heard over our eavesdropping that some of these duergar bastards are scared of that strange chimera sort of hodgepodge, human centipede thing? We could be one of those with a little bit of deception, and all of us sort of piling on each other. We could act like a big scary monster and go up and freak the fuck out of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah! That's actually a really good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- all of us piled on Grog and Trinket and you as the bases, and we become this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're basically gonna be like three kids Little Rascals-style on each other's shoulders with a giant coat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that could be the diversion, at least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, well then, why don't-- I actually like this idea. Why don't we have a few of our stealthy members, why don't we have the twins be in the shadows, and picking people off while--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, 'cause I've got range, so that makes sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, why don't we have some of our ranged people-- I'll transform. I can transform into-- how about a giant scorpion? That sounds fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you transform into anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can transform into beasts. They have to be beasts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about the type of beast that we know would scare them, like that big triceratops thing that we saw with the big metal thing on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can be a rhinoceros-- I can be, like-- Can I do dinosaurs? I can be a dinosaur, right? That's a new thing I can be, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to a certain point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if you were a scorpion, with a dragonborn tail sliding around and a gnome on your front leg and a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well here's, oh wait wait, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, hang on, hang on, hang on, this might be crazy-- wonder what would happen if I drank that weird yellowish potion? While I'm a monster?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, It could be poison, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm wondering if you can, like, if I can transform into a monster and then you with Polymorph can maybe just transform.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't have to snap at me.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, no, no, you're brilliant, your highness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thank you. I mean.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have an idea, I have an idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're off the rails, here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell it to us, Tiberius, what's the idea?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it involve shitting on a bed? (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Eventually, actually, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aren't you empty yet?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This is what's going to happen. As far as we know, they're all duergar up there, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mostly, except for the mind flayers. And another big monster probably, they might have--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which I saw in a vision. I think that's what's controlling them

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, that's K'varn. No, no, no, he's at the other one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, read it wrong.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This is what will happen. Those who can go stealth, we will creep up there. I will go invisible myself. I will be in front. You closely behind me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has a name.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Vax. There we go. You closely behind me, and whoever else can stealth follows suit. I will cast Alter Self and turn myself into their god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Their god?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: K'varn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you don't know what he looks like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, or into that other thingie.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I absolutely know what he looks like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mean Laduguer?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We just saw his statue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. that's not K'varn though.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But that's who they worship. As I give my, whatever the hell I come up with to say at that particular time--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you should think it first, think it through first.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As soon as the mind flayers catch on, and I turn to Clarota, and I turn to Kima, that's when all of you will strike at them first. The rest of you will wait 'til I shoot off a couple of Fireballs at the duergar once they figure out we're full of crap. 'Cause I'm sure that might happen unless I'm super convincing, which I hope that's the case-- But I think that's our best bet to keep a certain element of surprise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, so wait, are you going to be their god, and I'm still going to also be a crazy monster, as like your pet crazy monster, with our stealthy team, or just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the only thing better than their god would be their god on top of a giant scorpion.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have faith in you, Tiberius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You'll be like Xerxes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I cast, 'cause I've been wanting to use Thaumaturgy. Which can make your voice three times as louder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment he would be speaking, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At the moment he'd be speaking, okay, so let's do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's going to be so cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some theatrics.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love it when a good plan comes together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So some of us are stealthing, you're being a big god who talks loud and is riding a scorpion.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So maybe I'll tuck behind him, on top of you the scorpion, and then when you're getting ready to talk I'll just (whoosh) and then you'll-- your voice will be, you know, you'll have--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's good, that's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about this-- so, just to clarify, are we all going up the same staircase, or are we going up two separate staircases, Vex and Vax--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should just go up the same staircase. There's too many of them. If we split up we could just all die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know what-- there could be a million rooms up there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have no idea what's up there, but Tiberius has got a plan, I like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he's the god, we just go in behind him as the god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if we did like your Dimension Door? Is it too not very god-like if he's coming up the staircase like, hey?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Dimension Door's off the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, Tiberius. Tibs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But don't use the god thing. But don't use the god thing until we get to the big group. The big thing, if you see a guard, don't turn into a god, you gotta see like more than five people before you turn into a god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you intend to go up one of the other stairways? I believe this one by the entrance, the secret entrance we came in, will afford us the element of surprise. Do you think you want to go up one of the others?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, let's go up that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And make a distraction, right? Your plan is to make a distraction.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a brave dragonborn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on the party. Everyone stay close.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's the stealth party, not you, you and me, you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, all of us, all of us I guess, until we get upstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially all of us will be stealthed except for Tiberius, and you who is a scorpion, and you who's riding behind Tiberius.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm riding on her, so I probably won't be rolling for stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll be rolling.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I probably won't roll well, just putting it out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." Takes her greatsword in her hands. "Lead the way."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you guys are stealthing up first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all have Pass Without a Trace as long as you stand close enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, wait for the inspiration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have some inspiration dice to give out, that I can give out as bonus actions. Can I give it out before we go into battle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say like momentarily, right beforehand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good to know. But I can't mass give it out, just have to give it to one person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's one of those things where it has to be in the moment when the adrenaline's pumping, I think, for it to last into the combat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, and do we want to send Clarota and Kima off through a different staircase so we have at least a backup plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no stick together. Too big of a group of an army upstairs to split us up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't split the party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In those action movies, when there's one guy who goes away for a while, he comes back at the end and saves the day. If we did that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not going to be us!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you are venturing up which stairway?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The secret one, the one by-- in the storage room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. You guys--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got this. We got this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Grog fell over. Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been a good day. What are you going to say? Are you thinking about this? Think about something.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Start thinking about this now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are rooms up there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the name of the god again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Laduguer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I take off my armor right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd become a soft target. All right, you guys all make your way up, and you're all squeezing into this tiny, tiny room. You're all shoulder-to-shoulder, essentially. You come up to the top area, there's a small box, and there is just a single stone door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take a moment and you place your hand along this stone surface. You find that there's a low hum to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Careful, careful, careful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can tell that there's a small, almost like a thin whisper of string laid across the very top of the stone, where the wall meets it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course I can, of course I can. I'm going to take care of this, hold on. Yeah, this is thieves' tools, correct? 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, okay. You come up and you find that this is a very, very fine hair trigger. This is actually a partial enchantment as part of a magical trap. You know that with the slightest hint of false vibration to it, the door shifting or hitting it in the wrong place will trigger whatever this trap is. And so you bring your tools up, you manage to place one at the base of each point at where this arcane silver thread lies across. Simultaneously, you take your daggers and place them underneath the thread at each ends and sever them both at the same time. The thin whisper of a string just slowly glides down and vanishes into a small sparkle of light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cut the red wire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to lay my ear on the door and see what I can hear. That is 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hearing it, you hear what sounds like a low mutter of somewhere in the neighbourhood of ten to 15 low voices, and the slow, small shuffling of many, many, many, many footsteps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shuffling, you said? And if I listen for a moment, do I-- does it continue?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It, kind of, couple of footsteps, some talking, soft footprints. You can hear the scraping of metal--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's the only way we can go is through this door, right? We're all smooshed into this hallway--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a hallway this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so we stealth down the other hall, we try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I mooshed everyone away from this hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whispers and voices aren't directly on the other side of this wall, they're just in that room echoing through, but you do hear a lot of people there. All right, so, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we check for traps, check for traps, I look, I'm perceiving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Roll for perceiving (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 23 for Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I get twice that, good. Oh, good, that was way better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, no traps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both glide your way up and peek around the corner. What you see immediately are six duergar all stationed in this hallway guarding what looks like two large doors and entrance to this main chamber. And they're all just standing there, weapons ready, looking around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, which is the main chamber that you just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This big chamber here that you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that we were listening to at the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax sneaks back to the group and motions Tiberius over, and Keyleth over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're doing this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One moment, one moment. Lightning, Lightning, who knows Lightning?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you gonna try to Lightning Bolt an entire line?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know the magic of lightning? I've seen you do it before, I've seen you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do know it right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know it? Anyone who knows Lightning, I've seen it done on the battlefield with us, person to person to person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who is up once again, clearing his throat in your presence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi! Scanlan here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, you know how to harness the power of electricity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't wanna brag, but I'm a regular Ben Franklin over here. He's a guy, he's a gnome I knew once.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, can you and I focus our Call Lightning spells together? To Lightning these--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, mine's so fricking powerful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If Scanlan and one of the others does Lightning at the same time and it goes through that line, we could drop them all at once.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that's noisy, they'll come out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not that noisy, it's not like armor banging around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's gonna be noisy, it's not a stealthy attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a quick way to get rid of six people, though.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, is that what we need to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a row of duergar around the corner, they're all in a line like Radio City, we just-- if I can get-- Scanlan, if you-- what about you, Keyleth? Do I remember light-- or do you bring it down from above? Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to shock 'em?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I have an idea. Okay, I'll peek around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have plus ten because of my Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got six duergar in a row. Is there anything you can do that's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's when you see this long row of duergar that are all kind of armored and ready, guarding the front of this chamber.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Watery Sphere at the end of the last guy and create a giant ball.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, you're doing it now?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What does it look like, Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so this giant water sphere appears. At which side of the wall?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: On the last guy. Yeah, and I draw it towards us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is grabbing the gnome and tossing him out to the right, out here at the front of the group.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I stop at the last guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saving throws, what's your DC?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: My spell DC, 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a dexterity save? All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One at a time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of them fail! (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is gonna be cool, this is gonna be cool. It's gonna put them all in one spot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They were already in a line.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, now we can electrocute them and they're wet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is now an entire clustered sphere of water that is containing a mishmash of duergar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lightning Bolt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Call Lightning. All right, so, as Keyleth, you step forward, out in the hallway, you bring your arm up and there's this small cluster of dark clouds beginning to form and swirl up on the top of the 20-foot hallway. As it swirls, you bring your arm downward, and there's a sudden crack of thunder, a loud blasting sound that echoes through the hallway. As the lightning strikes the center of the sphere, the water itself bursts as the actual cacophonous blast of the lightning loosely shakes the aquatic sphere. However, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get any more damage because of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get an additional two dice of damage to each one of the duergar because they are contained in the water.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 5d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I roll for each one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just roll once, and that's across the board for all of them, and they are at a disadvantage because they are in the sphere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and they're at a disadvantage?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, because I'm like holding them up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's really funny, because two of them rolled 20s in a row, but they're at a disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice. Not too shabby. So we have ten, 19 plus 18, bringing it to 28 plus three, 31 plus one. 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the sphere explodes, the actual stone on the ground you can feel shake and shudder with the impact of the lightning storm. All but one of the duergar are blown apart and scattered across the wall Akira-style, just (splat) against the walls. One of them is still in the center of the sphere, now looking charred and burnt, and eyes wide open with anger and frustration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 14 vs the DC which I think is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, how much total did you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much did you do, total?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 32, total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! I shamed him to death

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) What a terrible way to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have definitely, however, announced your presence at the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax spanks Tiberius on the tail and says, get ready to deity! Going stealth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say-- I go, get on my back, get on my back, and I piggyback him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You transform?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Marisha, did you transform?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well I'm piggybacking him, just now. I'm literally just piggybacking Tiberius waiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Tiberius, you leap onto her back.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Mm-hm, and I cast Alter Self, and I turn to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, Vex.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to cast the thing on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you cast Thaumaturgy on him to give him a vocal emphasis, a roaring, booming voice. Do you stay with him or do you move back with the rest of the group?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, oh, Pike Pike Pike Pike Pike. What kind of animal would this god use? Would you know what kind of animal the duergar would worship? Do you know?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's a religion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Religion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What kind of animals he might like? You know, check out-- you know, animals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea. You know the deity exists, you don't know of any sort of animal, beast or creature symbolism that would befit a duergar god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have no idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess a scorpion, a scorpion sounds good? Scorpion. Giant Scorpion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius kind of holds on during the transformation--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go back, because if they see me, then they'll know something's fishy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Standing at probably a good-- what height are you going at?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How tall are the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The duergar are about four-and-a-half feet tall.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So let's make him six feet tall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, six-foot-tall duergar standing there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The two of us get back by the other twin door, and get ready to bust into that entrance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm with them. We're the stealth party.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in fact nudging Grog away from this door towards the front towards Tiberius. I don't know, they're not that strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing? Grog says, "Which way, which way do I go?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax kicks Grog in the butt and sends him forward. Go help Tiberius!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm walking back for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, don't do that. Not that far. Grog, come back, because if they see him--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, stay in the corner, Grog. Wait 'til I say help me, and then come kill everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Back him up. Back him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear shifting in the doorway from the front where you guys are. What's the plan? What's doing what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's going in first?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is this going to be the entrance where we're going in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah you bust in and be a god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, are we busting in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you give it, we'll go in the other way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck if I know.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's your job. Bust the door open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Giant scorpion. Athletics. Plus my dex, I'm assuming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, plus your strength.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the doors splinter open. The doors are actually broken off the hinges.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As that happens, I cast Light and I cast Prestidigitation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Concentrate. Don't cast too much shit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can't hear what's going on. I hear some annoyances in the background as I cast Prestidigitation to make my voice louder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she already did it. It's three times louder than it normally would be.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So just keep focusing on your Light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys come bursting in--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's a lot of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe do some Prestidigitation where you move shit around.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh ho ho. What!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Hello, everybody.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: (Grog voice) I would like to rage.
