lines.text: Nice. Okay, so, the next-- the first shot fires, just ricochets off his armor and streaks across the room. You get his attention, though, and he looks back at you with this kind of wild look in his eyes, the muscles tensing. You can see the armor actually bending and twisting against his physical form underneath. However, the next shot blasts off side of his jaw, there's actually a giant gap now in his flesh as he looks back at you and you can see his teeth. And as he grits down towards you, now definitely intent on getting vengeance on that, the second shot (impact sound) takes off a chunk of his head. You can see the skull exposed on where you've now taken a piece of flesh off the top of his scalp. He's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's move it, people. And I'm gonna take like a step back towards the door. Just with what's remaining of my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I killed him, didn't I? No, he's not dead, damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not dead yet. Not dead yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, that would've been so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The mind flayer, who is no longer dominated as Clarota took his attention off of that for the time being, looks around at everyone, sees the circumstance, the magma flowing down, and just grabs his chest and you can see his form blink out and vanish.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (groans) He peaced out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to the top. Vax. At this round, by the way, is broken and has begun to spread, the magma has now filled this much of the room. And it's quickening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My boots of haste are on, so I run-- I just dart right around Grog, around that column, up to the queen, while pulling out my keen dagger, I speak my mother's name, kiss the blade and shove it in, right into her collarbone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll for the attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's a two, but I'm gonna use Luck. I get ad-- 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because of it, and because Grog's there, this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is not an ally, currently. You do not get Sneak Attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't get Sneak Attack, all right. Three, ten, then. That's the first attack. And the second one also hits, that's a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten, nice. So the first blade plunges into her clavicle, she maneuvers out of the way to the point where it misses any vital points, but still sinks in. She looks at you angrily and you can see her dull white, ashy, duergar eyes flash with an intense arcane rage. As you pull the blade out, her eyes dart around with some sort of a plan, a thought process going through her head, as the other blade sinks into the side of her torso she spits out blood that actually spatters across your face. She pushes the blade out and you see her preparing herself for something. That ends your turn. Grog currently moves forward towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Grog voice) Wrong direction!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 25 versus armor class.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but Uncanny Dodge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many times can you-- you've already used that. It's once per encounter. Once per encounter you can use that. Next one is a 21 versus armor class?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once a round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once a round you can do it? Okay, well never mind. So take half on that first attack. All right, so. First strike comes at you with a-- oof, that'll be 19 points of damage. Reduced to nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second strike hits you for a total of 15 points of damage. So 24 total.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could be worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's Grog's go. That brings us to Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That really hurts, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my knowledge of the arcane arts, do I have any knowledge that using my Dispel Magic spell would work on Grog? Or do I just have to try it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a possibility. You know the spell that's been cast on him-- you use it. There is a chance, but it has to be a contested roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could roll a 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could roll a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it take my move to just stand up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it does, unfortunately. So it's your call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I don't have to be standing to cast a spell--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but I would say it's going to be difficult, it's going to give--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll stand up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You get back up. What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will-- Jesus, is it better for me to get out of there or get the king?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, get the king. You may be able to kill him. He's on his last legs, probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but Keyleth is right behind him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do it. Stab him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can attack him with your sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am a tiny, tiny boy. I can only do--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it anyway. He's at his last legs. It would be epic, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you got? Go ahead, quick. Magma's pouring through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) I have a dawn blade. It's just so lame though! It's so weak!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so. Go ahead and roll for an attack, d20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We said he could roll a 20! We called it! Who called it? We called it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, roll the dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So that's eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled an eight. Times two, that's 16, plus whatever the bonus damage is for the sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus seven. Plus the dawn blade gets another bonus attack at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. So, you strike with a critical hit, doing-- let's see, that's eight, 16, plus seven, 23 points of damage, go ahead and roll for a second attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never hit anyone with a sword before! Five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I give him a War God's Blessing and give him a plus ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, plus ten, so fifteen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's your total? You rolled a five, plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five plus-- ten-- I don't know, what am I adding? I've never used a sword before!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him, kill him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I-- as I draw back the blade, I say, oh! You should've stood on your head! And I lop it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blackened beard curling back as the rest of his face is melted away by the lava, which is now pouring pretty heavily into this room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Scanlan make you feel good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that's your action. And your movement. And your bonus action. No, you did your bonus action to do the extra attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Great, great. I don't know how to use swords!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow! You used a sword! And got a kill! On a boss!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good job, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, King Murghol's turn would be now, but he's on the ground. Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I call Trinket back. Get him away from that lava. I run past, 'cause I can't-- can I see? Do I have an angle or is it being blocked by molten tornado?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You-- it's completely blocked right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I run across behind it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Is that magmous right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is. It's still pouring! She slowed it down, but it's still breaking through and pouring out slower. It would be even bigger if they hadn't slowed it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then well, maybe I won't run in that direction. I run in the other direction and down-- yeah. So I can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: First attack is (sings) 20. No. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Okay. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Second attack is-- Second attack is (sings) 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Roll damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's that? 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 to hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or 12 damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 12 damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bonus action!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima's stone. It's now the queen's turn. She looks over at you who's stabbed her, the arrows in her abdomen, and she looks up at Grog and says, (sighs) "We've got business elsewhere." And she reaches out and touches Grog. Both of them blink out, Dimension Door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've lost Grog again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A very familiar purplish color as you've seen you cast it, they Dimension Door out of the entire vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Son of a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the second time we've lost Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the stone rocks crack on the column and the magma now goes into full pour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to get out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do now, what's the process?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We run!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we gotta get our stone friends out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, this is going into a skill challenge now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we all run out that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we don't all run out, they're stone, we have to drag them out, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who all's stone, it's Tiberius and Kima? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we-- where's the magic carpet? Throw their asses on the magic carpet!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog has the magic carpet. Grog had everything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, Feather Fall, do you have Feather Fall?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Before, before we leave, can I take some of the basilisk's blood and put it in a vial?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, this will be the first skill challenge. Go ahead and make a dexterity check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dexterity check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, can we get the magic carpet now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the magic carpet is in the bag of holding. That thing is huge. You carry that with you, you would be at disadvantage for everything you've been doing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, okay, so. I mean, you go over to it, and you manage to gather up into your wine skin a little bit of basilisk's blood, best you can. The magma pulls close to you and you manage to just take six points of fire damage from just the general heat of the magma now pouring into the room. It's spilling out and now just continuing to fill the rest of this chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shout to Percy, come, Tiberius, now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We pick him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys make an athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's not a strength check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this, this is just an athletics to pull them all off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys grab and pull Tiberius out of the room. It takes the two of you to heft him over. You manage to pull him out of the way, that works out well. Down the stairway, all right. We don't need the video for this, we're just going to do this visually. So, you guys manage to bring Tiberius down the stairway. What are you doing, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm unfurling my Bull's Strength scroll and reading it so I get a plus five to strength? Is that a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's Enhance Ability. So you go ahead and give yourself Enhance Ability. Your strength is now-- you have advantage on all of your strength checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, and I start to help, who was pushing Kima? I'm gonna help push Kima out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, no! Wait, didn't Clarota take Kima?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Clarota pulled Kima out of the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so we're all fucking fine, let's just get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go ahead and on our way out I cast Create Water, and I kinda just use my air ability and make a mist to try and like mist the lava that's coming towards us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do, but the magma's so intense and this has filled so much of the room now that you get a localized area. The rest of it just kinda flows around and continues to fill the space. All right, so. All of you guys make a dexterity check to try to get down quickly. Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I make another one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, everyone makes one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (hoarsely) I rolled a 19!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Seven!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Four!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get to roll twice 'cause of terrain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of-- yes you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get my Enhance Ability?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for this one.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I would like to note that I am frozen like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Tiberius is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha. So, Pike and Scanlan, both of you guys are, unfortunately 'cause you're smaller and your legs are moving, you guys rush down the stairway and curl around. As the rest of you make your way to the door, which is currently closed, you are all kinda gathered at the exterior of that hidden doorway. It's currently dark and held shut on where you guys entered. However, you two, the magma's now reached the stairway. It's beginning to pour down off the top, and it manages to catch the two of you. You guys each take five points of heat damage from the magma's proximity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To the two ladies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Pike and Scanlan. You guys make it to the bottom floor. The doorway is currently closed for the secret exit of the fortress.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax drops Tiberius' stone ass to the ground and starts feeling to get the mechanism of the door open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we at the foot of the stairs yet, me and Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys just make it to the foot of the stairs. You guys are now--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a big stone door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's the one you guys, the one you guys-- it opens up, outward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just cast Stone Shape and make a hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you're feeling around for the mechanism, Keyleth steps forward and basically the stone turns into almost a clay, and she just pulls it apart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Vax. I didn't mean to, like, overstep there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A giant glob of magma pours down and splashes down onto the ground, hitting everyone in the vicinity. Everyone down here takes 12 points of heat damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, it's hot, it's hot, it's hot!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hot hot hot hot hot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm picking up Tiberius' stone butt and continuing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys push through the open hole that Keyleth pushed in, sweat dripping down your faces as the heat proximity to you is nigh-intolerable. You make your way out of the gate and now you have that giant magma flow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right! Is the thing not-- wasn't there--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No no-- as you guys go and step out, the doorway that opened up, previously? Is what parted the magma flow. You pulled it open, so now it's just a wall of magma in front of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She also had created a wall barrier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did create a wall over top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. It's not there anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was permanent!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was permanent, but a perpetual flow of magma on it for a period of a few hours will eventually eat through a stone wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you cast it again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can. Yeah. Do it again. Bam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's probably the last of that. You create a stone wall that juts out, once again blocking off the magma flow. You guys all step out of the room just as the main force of magma begins to fill the room behind you. Everyone make one more dexterity check to get out in time, as it's a small space and you're pushing out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You made nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "You made nothing." Seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Everyone under 15: you, you, Percy, I believe, and Keyleth. The magma now, as you're helping getting your friends out, you're pushing out, you push Vex out-- Vex darts out, Scanlan manages to get out. As you guys are pulling Tiberius through, the hefty force of magma comes funneling down into the room and splashes across the floor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's a lot of dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 18 points of heat damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 18 points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're pushing through, Vax, you fall unconscious as the magma is currently lapping at the back of your leg. The rest of you begin pushing out as you begin to realize that your half-elf friend is currently melting in a pool of magma.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I grab him? Can I grab him out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a strength check. This is strength at this point, this is pure adrenaline pushing through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. You manage to start pulling him up through the hole that Keyleth made.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to assist, I'm pulling out-- I'm doing another ice shot to try and cool off the magma around him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I send Trinket up, to like, pull him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before you get to that point, as you're readying for it, 'cause it's a small space-- as you're pulling it, giant bear claws come over and latch onto the back of Vax's armor. The grizzly bear begins to tense, pulling back. Makes a strength check. That'll do it. Both of you manage to pull you out. You take an additional bit of heat damage. You are now at two failed saving throws. Two failed death saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am a centimeter away from real death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he pulls it out, you can see most of his foot is melted. And his right leg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw, that's his best leg.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull a level two healing potion, just get it in his mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you pull it out. At this point, the magma's beginning to fill up the room, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, wait wait wait, can I take my stone wall and like, close it off? We're all out, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're outside of it. How long does Stone Shape last?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stone Shape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you used on the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just-- I'm just taking it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Closing the wall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm closing it. I can do it again, I still have two more spell slots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, how many spells do you have at that level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three. So you spent--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One, so far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One going out, coming-- no, wait, it's the same-- you haven't had a chance to do a full night's rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. I was an animal all week-- all last game. I didn't use any last game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, so you used the stone form, used Stone Wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I used one Stone Wall last week and I have two level five spells now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It blocks off the magma just as it begins to pour over and spill out into this vicinity. It'll last a short time, but it'll last enough for what you guys need. You guys drag--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I heal him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can attempt to, yeah, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anticipation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. C'mon, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Heals you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your foot heals up, but it's still burned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew, get that away from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the time being, until you can take some serious physical rest, your movement is reduced by five. And your stealth rolls are currently at disadvantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can that ever be healed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over time with some rest it can be, but right now-- like, you're healed up, but that foot is scarred. It probably spent a good six seconds completely submerged in molten lava.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you telling me I'll never compete in the roller derby again? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quite possibly. You all are just on the outskirts of the stronghold. You can see now elements of the windows of the top floor are beginning to glow with internal light, as the entire stronghold is currently filling up entirely with molten rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I left my keys in there! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're all resting for a moment, off to the side. Grog is missing. And you all take a moment to realize that somehow you all managed to survive this, mostly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sort of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you didn't find the vault, didn't find Kima's stuff, and a number of escaped individuals from this are out and at large. We'll end today's game on that note.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, I need Bad News to be my other foot now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you should have-- you need, like, a sweet pimp swagger now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that went a little long, guys. Thank you for your-- for hanging out, but that was an intense session. Some climactic moments there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure you guys don't want to send in a bulette, right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, or maybe, like, you know, a black ooze. You wanna do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, guys.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That was fucking intense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was crazy!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Guys. Riveting. And exhausting. Are you guys tired?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: No dancing tonight, guys, get over it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry it went late.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That went so long, I'm sorry guys.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: No, they are happy that you went late. They want you to stay forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was nuts.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, so first off, I'm gonna thank the_Duganator8--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And then as a quick update for what's happening tomorrow, we have three performances tomorrow night. So tomorrow is Gather Your Party and it's kinda like our bring your friends, have a good time with board games and music and everything. So Indiecade's coming by tomorrow night to show off some new board games. And then we have two bands playing, Sonja Midtune and Bearwolf. And then we have the musical improv group that was here during the charity drive is coming back to do a performance, Robot Teammates and The Accidental Party, and that's tomorrow night, it'll be a lot of fun. So I'm just gonna pull up these donations and messages, if you wanted to see and start going through 'em. And we'll probably have more as we get to the top. So starting at Fifthdreamtoday said, "I love Critical role, kudos for giving to a great cause."
